sentences.en: A ray of sunlight thrust out through the clouds.
sentences.cn: 一缕阳光透过云层照射下来。

sentences.en: A spectrum is formed by a ray of light passing through a prism.
sentences.cn: 一束光通过棱镜就会形成光谱。

sentences.en: I suggested that he rest, and sent him for an X-ray.
sentences.cn: 我建议他休息，并让他去拍个X光片。

sentences.en: It will only register on sophisticated X-ray equipment.
sentences.cn: 只有精密的X射线仪器才能显示出来。

sentences.en: Ray and I ate our meal and reminisced about the trip.
sentences.cn: 雷和我吃着饭，回忆起那次旅行。

sentences.en: Ray and sister Renee lived just 25 miles apart from each other.
sentences.cn: 雷和妹妹勒妮的住处仅相隔25英里。

sentences.en: Ray changed his mind, claiming that he had been forced into confessing.
sentences.cn: 雷翻了供，声称自己是被逼招供的。

sentences.en: Ray Houghton smacked the ball against a post.
sentences.cn: 雷·霍顿把球狠狠地砸到一根柱子上。

sentences.en: Ray painted below the waterline with a special anti-rust paint.
sentences.cn: 雷用专门的防锈涂料涂船的吃水线以下的部位。

sentences.en: Ray was getting very hot and bothered about the idea.
sentences.cn: 这个想法让雷心慌意乱。

sentences.en: Ray was very giggly and joking all the time.
sentences.cn: 蕾特别喜欢咯咯地笑，而且总是爱开玩笑。

sentences.en: Ray will earn his keep on local farms while studying.
sentences.cn: 雷求学期间会在当地的农场干活赚取生活费。

sentences.en: She was advised to have an abdominal X-ray.
sentences.cn: 她被建议拍一张腹部的X光片。

sentences.en: The hospital staff held off taking Rosenbaum in for an X-ray.
sentences.cn: 医院工作人员推迟了罗森鲍姆的X光检查。

sentences.en: The room darkened as a cloud hid the sun’s rays.
sentences.cn: 一朵云挡住了阳光，房间暗了下来。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 雷·查尔斯（美国第一位灵歌艺人）
(非正式)给人带来温暖的人（或物）

trans.tran_en: a straight narrow beam of light from the sun or moon
